DOC.criteria: Age 13 year old either gender racial/ethnic group . Subjects must clinically evident acne vulgaris facial skin . Subjects must understand sign inform consent prior participation . Subjects must generally good health . Subjects must able willing comply requirement protocol . You must live within reasonable drive distance Ann Arbor , Michigan , and/or able attend schedule appointment study . Oral retinoid ( Accutane ) use within 1 year entry study . Systemic acne therapy ( oral antibiotic ) within 4 week entry study . Topical acne therapy ( retinoids , antibiotic ) within 2 week entry study . Microdermabrasion superficial chemical peel sit treat within 3 month entry study . Subjects history dermabrasion laser resurface site treat . Use topical lipid absorb substance ( Clinac AC ) within 2 week entry study . Noncompliant subject . Subjects significant medical history concurrent illness/condition investigator ( ) feel safe study participation . Subjects use alcoholbased topical solution `` exfolliating '' agent within 2 week entry study . Subjects history frequent herpes simplex infection face clinical evidence active herpes simplex infection . History keloid scar formation subject undergoing biopsy . Pregnant nursing female .
